reviewText:
Great true-crime show from 1959-61. The original reality cop show. A two-disk set that contains the following half-hour episodes:
1. The Failure
2. End of the World
3. Presumption of Guilt
4. The Angry Men
5. Writ of Terror
6. The Drop
7. The Manly Art of Murder
8. His Father's Footsteps
9. Voice of Doom
10. Beau and Arrow Case
